entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
